about_the_game:
About This Game


WARRIOR SPIRIT™ is a classic single-player 3D Action-Adventure Platformer unlike anything else.
Play as a Clay Machine created to destroy evil clay monsters. Combine the four Arms of Good with a diverse set of clay materials to swing, bounce, wall-run and dash through the four corners of the land, each a giant area to explore.

It is your charge to bring the will of Good to bear against the monsters of evil and use unique tools to pinch, smash and slice your way to victory.

Choose your style, with multiple paths through levels; using motion to speed to the exit, or take time to explore the many puzzles of the world, and collect sand dollars to spend on additional clay items.



The Tools of WARRIOR SPIRIT.
WARRIOR SPIRIT’s Helmet of Good provides multiple Arms, each with their own unique moves and tools.
  • The White Arm can grab all sorts of things, like clay to bounce, swing, and climb.
  • The Red Arm wields The Cutter of Good, which slices clay.
  • The Blue Arm holds The Needle of Good, which pinches clay.
  • The Yellow Arm commands The Mallet of Good, which smashes clay.



Meet the monsters of evil.
The monsters are running amok across the land. Each unique type has its own weakness to the different Arms of Good. Defeating them can leave you with useful clay tools.



Master your environment.
WARRIOR SPIRIT can use the particular properties of clay to traverse the world and solve puzzles.
  • Bounce clay reaches higher heights.
  • Hard clay provides a platform for scaling walls.
  • Sticky clay can swing away from danger.
  • Life clay restores valuable life.

Features

  • Huge open world – Four unique corners of the world to explore. From the glass-ridden desert, to the schoolhouse jungle – the opulent sea tower, to the factory of clay.
  • Play your way – Test your skills and dash for the objective, or take a step back and survey the many puzzle platformer challenges across the world.
  • Never blame your tools – Zoom over bodies of water, bounce up ledges, swing from vines or speed across walls with the traversal tools at your disposal.
  • Go toe-to-toe – Test your combat skills and wield the Arms of Good against a host of evil monsters, each with different strengths and weaknesses.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1/ Windows 8.1 / Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2105 / AMD A10-5800K
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 560 2GB/AMD Radeon 6870 HD 2GB or equivalent (Integrated graphics not supported)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1/ Windows 8.1 / Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600 / AMD Ryzen 7 1800X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 / AMD Radeon RX 470
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1080p 60fps
